Text: Thank You for the share.  I purchased Pillars Of The Earth and didn't upload as it was previously posted. You may be pleased to know the sequel "World Without End" is here already.  I recommend the follow-up with the caveat that it may or may not be as good; depending on perspective but my wife and I thoroughly enjoyed it.

PS: Diana Gabaldon's Outlander series (published in the UK as Cross Stitch) seems to be available here to provide another journey to 'Olde England'.  I couldn't get past the 'bodice ripper' aspect of Outlander but obviously the author found a market since she tapped out 7 of the tomes and they've all found their way to Pirate Bay.
Thanks I will check out the sequel....
Pillars of the Earth is Ken Follet's best work. I havent listened to World Without End yet, but plan to some day.
